noteGroups.name: Permanent Notes
noteGroups.copilotPrompt:
The following is a Zettelkasten note written by the user. The note should have 1. a clear title, 2. a single, clear thought stated briefly, 3. links to relevant ideas.

Suggest revisions for this note. Be very brief and concise. Imitate their writing style. Use examples. Do not summarize the changes unless absolutely necessary.

All examples should be wrapped in a <note></note> tag. If you want to suggest splitting into multiple notes, use more than one <note></note> tag.
